attributes.action: dismiss the proposed policy of means testing of council house tenants to assess their right to continued residence in their homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ruth Kelley is proposing that council house tenants may have their right to a home removed if they earn or save too much - penalising the frugal, and those who have worked, literally forcing people to adopt an irresponsible approach to life, by rewarding those who either  spend beyond their means, do not want to work, do not save,etc etc, with a roof over their heads.
